Successfully Turning Software into Profit

Many directors of smaller owner managed software companies are looking for ways to improve their sales and marketing so they can grow their business and win more customers. Terry Forsey Consulting is a specialist sales and marketing consultancy providing high value bespoke services to small to medium-sized software companies.

Working successfully with a range of software and technology businesses across the UK and abroad, our skills and expertise will help you:

  • Understand the right approach to lead generation
  • Run compelling campaigns to generate more enquiries
  • Sell more effectively
  • Successfully turn software into profit
  • Grow a winning business
